name: Arssi
body:
### What is it
Arssi is the best way to use your remote irssi on an Android device.
It consists of three parts:

1. An irssi script handles low-level irssi signals and passes them to
2. A Django app that is used for communication between irssi and
3. An Android app that is the actual client you want to use

### Setting it all up
